StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdatePersonnelBilletWithFillInGap]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @Organiza.onID int, @Recrui.ngRoleID varchar(2), @BilletBeginDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15), @result varchar(200) OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE
@MaxRecruiterHistoryBilletEndDate date.me
SET @result=''
SELECT @MaxRecruiterHistoryBilletEndDate = MAX(BILLET_END_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
-- Billets overlop IF (DATEDIFF(DAY,@MaxRecruiterHistoryBilletEndDate, @BilletBeginDate) <= 0) BEGIN SET @result = 'Billets cannnot overlap. Please change the Begin date.' END -- Fill in Non-Recrui.ng Assignments for gap ELSE IF (DATEDIFF(DAY,@MaxRecruiterHistoryBilletEndDate, @BilletBeginDate) > 1) BEGIN Insert Into Recruiter_History( Recrui.ng_Person_Id, E.ec.ve_Date, Billet_Begin_Date, Billet_End_Date, Billet_Desc, HQ_Name, Region_Name, District_Name, RS_Name, RSS_Name, Organiza.on_Type, User_Login, Update_Date )
SELECT TOP 1 Recrui.ng_Person_Id, DATEADD(day,1,@MaxRecruiterHistoryBilletEndDate), DATEADD(day,1,@MaxRecruiterHistoryBilletEndDate), DATEADD(day,-1,@BilletBeginDate), 'Other', HQ_Name, Region_Name, District_Name, RS_Name, RSS_Name, Organiza.on_Type, User_Login, getdate() FROM dbo.RECRUITER_HISTORY WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=@PersonID ORDER BY BILLET_BEGIN_DATE DESC END IF @result = '' BEGIN UPDATE RECRUITING_PERSON SET ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID, RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = @Recrui.ngRoleID, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE = @BilletBeginDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Remove this recruiter from sector assignments ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID = rowguid FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=@PersonID
DECLARE @USER_GUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT TOP(1) @USER_GUID = [UserID] FROM [UserMgmt].[dbo].[User] WHERE [Username] like @UserLogin + '%' AND [IsAc.ve] = 1 ORDER BY [LastAc.vityDate] DESC
IF @USER_GUID = null BEGIN SET @USER_GUID = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' END
EXEC [RSSOSS].[USMC].[InsertUpdateMapsSectorRecruiter] @SectorRecruiterId = null, @SectorID = null, @Recrui.ngPersonId = @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID, @LastUpdateUserId = @USER_GUID ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SET @result = 'SUCCESS' END
SELECT @result
